title: One Of Sam Smith's Grammys A Win For Tom Petty, Too
teaser: The four Grammys awarded Sunday night to Sam Smith are good news not just for Sam Smith, but for Tom Petty, too. Petty and another songwriter will get a quarter of the royalties from the hit, "Stay With Me." It's not the first time a pair of songs have striking similarities to one another.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
